response.quote:
Do you know what a scientist fears most in this world above all else?
It's oblivion, my friend.
A scientist measures our lives in the ways we develop and expand our knowledge through myriad variations.
Nothing can take its place. It's our very soul.
I have done the worst thing one scientist can do to another:
I have altered your thought process.
When my drug takes effect, you will find your mind has lost the ability to think.
